pages.title: Native Resources
pages.text: Comparable to their common resource counterparts, like $(thing)Raw Copper$(), these variants much more pure than what you were used to before. Not only that: These shivers are almost surrounded by a invisible sheen, gently protecting it from outside forces, up to $(thing)Native Copper$() not even oxidizing anymore.

pages.title: Cinderhearth Smelting
pages.text: Smelting these in the $(l:magical_blocks/cinderhearth)Cinderhearth$() yields a higher output instead of their common variants, like $(thing)Raw Iron$().
